member.summary: This creates a checkpoint using the current values. The checkpoint remains available until EndEdit or CancelEdit is called.
member.remarks: Calling this method multiple times will have no effect.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Anchor.Modeling.Internals.EditableObjectPropertyBag.CancelEdit
member.summary: This reverts all changes to the checkpoint values. CancelEdit is called recursively on any value in the original list.
member.remarks: Calling this when there are no matching BeginEdit will have no effect.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Anchor.Modeling.Internals.EditableObjectPropertyBag.EndEdit
member.summary: This removed one level of checkpoint values. EndEdit is called recursively on any value in the list of checkpoint values.
member.remarks: Calling this when there are no matching BeginEdit will have no effect.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Anchor.Modeling.Internals.EditableObjectPropertyBag.RejectChanges(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replaces the current values collection with the original values collection.
member.remarks: Calling this cancels all pending edits.
